page.title: 05EISTEDDFODS
page.content: An Eisteddfod is a festival of arts, that is a tradition in Wales. The Urdd is an organisation for the young people of Wales that encourages the use of the Welsh language. Each year the Urdd organises local Eisteddfods for the young people of Wales; winners from the local competitions are eligible to compete in the Urdd National Eisteddfod, which is held annually alternating between North and South Wales. The competitions for the stage events are all in the medium of Welsh_ singing, reciting, dancing and playing musical intruments. There are art and craft competitions and sporting events. The pupils at Libanus C.P. School take part in the eisteddfods each year and have won at local and national level.
